name: Dinosaur Park - Jeep Driver
description:
Dinosaur Park - Jeep Driver!!!
Be the best jurassic truck driver in the city. Show of your driving skill in this precision parking and driving simulator. go behind the wheel of airplane , jeep , boat
FEATURES
- dynamic camera angles,
- the best car driving physics
- drive around in the city!
- airplane , jeep , boat
- authentic jurassic truck supercars
- huge selection of high quality rescue vehicles
- easy to use driving controls, both touch and tilt controls!
